message.content:
Based on the provided credit specifications and candidate profiles, here's the ranking from most suitable (#1) to least suitable (#12):

1. Marko Marković (Google Switzerland): Highest bank account balance (70,000 CHF), permanent employment, living in Zug
2. Ayse Şahin (Swiss Red Cross): Strong 2nd pillar balance, permanent employment, diverse fund composition
3. Claudia Steiner (Stadler Rail): Stable employment, good fund distribution
4. Daniel Keller (Herzog & de Meuron): Solid professional background, balanced funds
5. Alban Kastrati (KPMG): Strong 2nd pillar balance, good professional standing
6. Sara Sousa (Cornèr Banca): Highest bank account balance (65,000 CHF) among lower-ranked candidates
7. Marta Lopez (Swiss Post): Stable employment, balanced funds
8. Paulo Costa (Gruner AG): Moderate fund distribution
9. Ganimete Berisha (ELCA Informatique): Balanced funds, IT security background
10. José Gonzalez (Galenica): Average fund distribution
11. Ismail Aydın (Federal Office): Lower 2nd pillar balance
12. Danijela Stojanović (Julius Bär): Lowest Pillar 3a balance

All candidates share similar net income and own funds, making the ranking nuanced.

context.systems_message:
